abstract.text: A template for displaying text inside an open gauge, with additional text at the bottom of the gauge.

inlineContent.text: to create complications for watchOS 10 or later. For more information, see Migrating to WidgetKit.

platforms.message: On watchOS 9.0 or later, use WidgetKit instead
platforms.name: watchOS

inlineContent.text: shows the layout of the complication and where it appears on the clock face.

abstract.text: Display app-specific data on the clock face.
A large square area that ClockKit displays on the X-Large watch face.
An abstract superclass for all the extra-large circular graphic templates.
A template for displaying an extra-large, full-color circular image inside a closed circular gauge.
A template for displaying text inside an extra-large closed circular gauge.
A template for displaying an extra-large SwiftUI view inside a closed circular gauge.
A template for displaying an extra-large, full-color circular image, an open gauge, and text.
A template for displaying text inside an open gauge, with additional leading and trailing text.
A template for displaying text inside an open gauge, with additional text at the bottom of the gauge.
The text to display at the bottom of the gauge.
The text to display in the center of the gauge.
The gauge to display in the complication.
Creates a new template with an open circular gauge, a small text element at the bottom, and a larger text element in the center.
Returns a new template with an open circular gauge, a small text element at the bottom, and a larger text element in the center.
A template for displaying a SwiftUI view, an open gauge, and text.
Extend the reach of your app by creating widgets, watch complications, Live Activities, and controls.
A protocol that objects adopt to provide functional copies of themselves.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type with a customized textual representation suitable for debugging purposes.
A type whose instances can be encoded, and appropriately passed, as elements of a C `va_list`.

media-3667232.alt: A diagram showing the layout of the complication that calls out the content produced by the gauge, center text, and bottom text providers.

inlineContent.text: to create complications for watchOS 10 or later. For more information, see Migrating to WidgetKit.
